import React from 'react'; import { PageContent } from './PageContent.js'; export function DiningPage(props) { // [DATA] getting only cards belong that page let pageCardData = props.cardData.filter((cardObj) => { return cardObj.category === "dining"; }) return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Hawaiian Dining

Discover the flavors of paradise with authentic Hawaiian cuisine, fresh seafood, and tropical delights

{pageCardData.length} Restaurants
4.8 Avg Rating
6 Islands
{/* Featured Categories */}

Dining Categories

Fine Dining

Elegant restaurants with gourmet Hawaiian cuisine

Local Cafes

Cozy spots serving fresh coffee and local treats

Fresh Seafood

Ocean-to-table dining with the catch of the day

{/* Main Content */}
) }
